title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-15.10 - Proposed findings and determinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-15.10 - Proposed findings and determinations

State Regulations
ORPTS shall prepare a resolution which will include
proposed findings and determinations for use by the State Board in establishing
final State equalization rates, class equalization rates or class ratios as
provided in section
1210
of the Real Property Tax Law. Staff
reports prepared pursuant to section
8186-15.9
of this Subpart shall be made part of the findings and determinations. Such
findings and determinations shall be prepared in a manner intended to set forth
an adequate statement of the factual basis for the State Board's determinations
so as to facilitate any subsequent judicial review of the State Board's
determinations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-15.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
